description: [Brute Ratel C4](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1063) can decode Kerberos 5 tickets and convert it to hashcat format for subsequent cracking.(Citation: Palo Alto Brute Ratel July 2022)

external_references.description: Harbison, M. and Renals, P. (2022, July 5). When Pentest Tools Go Brutal: Red-Teaming Tool Being Abused by Malicious Actors. Retrieved February 1, 2023.
